items.sentence: I wonder if she\'ll recognize me after all these years.
The doctor told us that what Tom has isn\'t contagious.
Have you been told the reasons why we didn\'t hire you?
Have you ever thought about getting a pilot\'s license?
Tom was very upset when Mary didn\'t come to his party.
If you don\'t want to say anything, you don\'t have to.
Tom is thinking about applying for a better-paying job.
Tom just got out of the bath and his hair is still wet.
Tom kissed Mary on the cheek and then got into his car.
Tom knew it was too late to call, but he called anyway.
